pkgsearch 3.0.2.9000
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Advanced CRAN package search

Source: R/advanced_search.R
advanced_search.Rd

See the Elastic documentation for the syntax and features: https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/current/query-dsl-query-string-query.html

advanced_search(
  ...,
  json = NULL,
  format = c("short", "long"),
  from = 1,
  size = 10
)

Arguments

...

Search terms. For named terms, the name specifies the field to search for. For unnamed ones, the term is taken as is. The individual terms are combined with the AND operator.
json

A character string that contains the query to send to Elastic. If this is not NULL, then you cannot specify any search terms in ....
format

Default formatting of the results. short only outputs the name and title of the packages, long also prints the author, last version, full description and URLs. Note that this only affects the default printing, and you can still inspect the full results, even if you specify short here.
from

Where to start listing the results, for pagination.
size

The number of results to list.

Value

Search hits.

Examples

# All orphaned packages
advanced_search(Maintainer = "ORPHANED")

#> - "advanced search" ---------------------------- 39 packages in 0.001 seconds -
#>   #     package        version   by         @ title                            
#>   1 100 mvcwt          1.3.1     ORPHANED  2y Wavelet Analysis of Multiple T...
#>   2 100 distances      0.1.8     ORPHANED  1y Tools for Distance Metrics       
#>   3 100 Funclustering  1.0.2     ORPHANED  2y Functional Data Clustering       
#>   4  96 datadr         0.8.6.1   ORPHANED  2y Divide and Recombine for Large...
#>   5  96 SDMTools       1.1.221.2 ORPHANED 10M Species Distribution Modelling...
#>   6  96 NanoStringNorm 1.2.1.1   ORPHANED 27d Normalize NanoString miRNA and...
#>   7  96 nhlscrapr      1.8.1     ORPHANED  4y Compiling the NHL Real Time Sc...
#>   8  86 gWidgets       0.0.54.2  ORPHANED  5M gWidgets API for Building Tool...
#>   9  86 clues          0.6.2.2   ORPHANED 10M Clustering Method Based on Local 
#>  10  86 rda            1.0.2.2.1 ORPHANED  2y Shrunken Centroids Regularized...

# Packages that match a certain field
advanced_search(Author = "Hester AND NOT Wickham")

#> - "advanced search" ---------------------------- 25 packages in 0.004 seconds -
#>   #     package        version by              @ title                         
#>   1 100 gmailr         1.0.0   Jim Hester     1y Access the 'Gmail' 'RESTful...
#>   2  95 primerTree     1.0.5   Jim Hester     9M Visually Assessing the Spec...
#>   3  89 knitrBootstrap 1.0.2   Jim Hester     2y 'knitr' Bootstrap Framework   
#>   4  86 types          1.0.0   Jim Hester     4y Type Annotations              
#>   5  85 glue           1.4.2   Jim Hester     1M Interpreted String Literals   
#>   6  71 pak            0.1.2   Gábor Csárdi   2y Another Approach to Package...

# Packages for permutation tests and permissive licenses
advanced_search("permutation test AND NOT License: GPL OR GNU")

#> - "advanced search" --------------------------- 299 packages in 0.014 seconds -
#>   #     package           version by                         @ title

# Packages that have a certain field
advanced_search("_exists_" = "URL")

#> - "advanced search" -------------------------- 8738 packages in 0.001 seconds -
#>   #     package              version by                                      @
#>   1 100 tabplotd3            0.3.3   Edwin de Jonge<edwindjonge@gmail.com>  7y
#>   2 100 tsbridge             1.1     Guy J. Abel                            6y
#>   3 100 yearn                0.1.3   Brian O'Meara                          3y

#>  10 100 pbdDMAT              0.5.1   Drew Schmidt                           2y

# Packages that do not have a certain field:
advanced_search("NOT _exists_: URL")

#> - "advanced search" -------------------------- 9001 packages in 0.001 seconds -
#>   #     package          version by                          @ title           
#>   1 100 refund.wave      0.1     Adam Ciarleglio            6y Wavelet-Domai...

#>   5 100 glmmBUGS         2.4.2   Patrick Brown              2y Generalised L...
#>   6 100 FUNLDA           1.1     Daniel Backenroth          3y Genomic Laten...

#>   8 100 miniparquet      0.1.2   Hannes Mühleisen           1y Read Parquet ...

#>  10 100 MExPosition      2.0.3   Cherise R. Chin Fatt       7y Multi-table E...

# The same but as JSON query
query <- '{
"query": {
  "bool": {
    "must_not": {
      "exists": {
        "field": "URL"
      }
    }
  }
}
}'
advanced_search(json = query)

#> - "advanced search" ------------------------------ 9001 packages in 0 seconds -
#>   #     package          version by                          @ title           
#>   1 100 refund.wave      0.1     Adam Ciarleglio            6y Wavelet-Domai...
#>   2 100 MoonFinder       1.0.3   Lixin Cheng                1y Identify Moon...
#>   3 100 cudaBayesregData 0.3.11  Adelino Ferreira da Silva  8y Data sets for...

# Regular expressions
advanced_search(Author = "/Joh?nathan/")

#> - "advanced search" --------------------------- 202 packages in 0.001 seconds -

# Fuzzy search
advanced_search(Author = "Johnathan~1")
